element.name: Crop Circles by orangetigerprawn, Unknown Cache (4/1.5)

description.center: Is there something supernatural about this, a logical explanation, or is it just a little bit fishy? Meditate on the meaning of life and hum along to the resonance of the nearby high tension power lines to tune into the essence of the universe.

long-description.center: In order to find the capsule at the end of this cosmic rainbow you'll have to contemplate the following mental challenges.
The above coordinates are on private land to which you have no right of access.
Calculate the circumference of the circle at this location. Round it to the nearest hecto metre. A
How many access points are there to the circle? B
How many roads border the field in which the circle is located? C
How many thousand volts are carried by the most powerful high tension cables that criss cross the general area? D
At this location count the number of gates. E
The end of the rainbow is located at:
The contaimer may seem familiar yet different when you find it. Stealth might be needed at the final location due to the presence of large windows nearby.

element.additional-waypoints:
2C226T3 - Second Crop
N 53째 26.101 W 006째 22.033
Second Stage: How many gates?
element.encoded-hints: Were you a hero in the year of our Arthur 39 AG?

ul.li:
2010-03-10T20:00:00Z : Found it by Blue Jay 59
Worked this out handy enough, so when Toffee Man came in this evening we took a quick spin and grabbed the cache. Hardest part was finding out how many volts etc. took a bit of googling. That Prof. Google is marvellous [:)] Yes different but familiar. Had no clue what the hint meant. TFTC & the puzzle Blue Jay 59 #240

2010-03-10T20:00:00Z : Found it by Toffee Man
Found the cache today with Blue Jay 59. Nice hiding spot & contained is certainly a bit different. Have you given up the coke? TFTC Toffee Man #242

2010-02-19T20:00:00Z : Found it by Fjon
Cache no. 1300. Took a while to figure out this one and eventually find it! Lucky it's close to where I work so had a few trips out during lunch time.

2010-01-03T20:00:00Z : Found it by snoopyandmickey
The brainiac team member needed to solve this one! TFTC!

2009-12-27T20:00:00Z : Found it by Hezekiah
Found after a fair bit of head scratching - and a certain amount of car rescue! Roads were like glass, but 4x4 wins every time - bit baffled by the hint.
TFTC!

wpt.name: GC226T3
wpt.desc: Crop Circles by orangetigerprawn, Unknown Cache (4/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: Crop Circles
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:short_description:
Crop Circles


Is there something supernatural about this, a logical explanation, or is it just a little bit fishy? Meditate on the meaning of life and hum along to the resonance of the nearby high tension power lines to tune into the essence of the universe.
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
In order to find the capsule at the end of this cosmic rainbow you'll have to contemplate the following mental challenges.
 

The above coordinates are on private land to which you have no right of access.
Calculate the circumference of the circle at this location. Round it to the nearest hecto metre. A
How many access points are there to the circle? B
How many roads border the field in which the circle is located? C
How many thousand volts are carried by the most powerful high tension cables that criss cross the general area? D
 

At N 53° 26.101 W 006° 22.033
At this location count the number of gates. E
 
 
The end of the rainbow is located at:
 
N 53° A*E+C.(A+C+E)^C-B+D
W 006° A*E-C.ZERO D/(B+E)+A+E
 
 


The Cache
 
The contaimer may seem familiar yet different when you find it. Stealth might be needed at the final location due to the presence of large windows nearby.

Additional Waypoints

2C226T3 - Second Crop
N 53째 26.101 W 006째 22.033
Second Stage: How many gates?
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: Were you a hero in the year of our Arthur 39 AG?

TFTC & the puzzle Blue Jay 59 #240
